sentences.en: a local TV station
sentences.cn: 一家当地电视台

sentences.en: An alarm links the police station to the divisional headquarters.
sentences.cn: 在部门总部和警察局之间连有警报器。

sentences.en: An automatic weather station feeds information on wind direction to the computer.
sentences.cn: 自动化气象站将风向信息输入计算机。

sentences.en: At the police station, I was charged with assault.
sentences.cn: 在警察局，我被指控殴打他人。

sentences.en: Grand Central Station
sentences.cn: 中央火车站

sentences.en: His objective was to kill the space station project altogether.
sentences.cn: 他的目的是使空间站项目全面停止。

sentences.en: His office was in keeping with his station and experience.
sentences.cn: 他的办公室与其身份和阅历相称。

sentences.en: I want to get off at the next station.
sentences.cn: 我要在下一站下车。

sentences.en: I was stationed overseas at the time.
sentences.cn: 那时候我被派驻在海外。

sentences.en: Is there a waiting room in the station?
sentences.cn: 车站里有候车室吗？

sentences.en: Red, white and blue bunting hung in the city's renovated train station.
sentences.cn: 红、白、蓝彩旗装点着该市修复一新的火车站。

sentences.en: Station staff announced the arrival of the train over the tannoy.
sentences.cn: 车站工作人员通过广播告知火车到站了。

sentences.en: The cabdriver took them on a circuitous route to the police station.
sentences.cn: 出租车司机载着他们绕了个大圈才到警察局。

sentences.en: the city bus station
sentences.cn: 市内公共汽车站

sentences.en: The money to build the power station ought to have been sufficient.
sentences.cn: 建设电站的资金本该足够了。

sentences.en: The police stopped her and took her off to a police station.
sentences.cn: 警察拦住她，把她带到了警察局。

sentences.en: The radio station claimed that 87,000 "reactionaries" had been eliminated.
sentences.cn: 广播电台声称已经消灭了87,000名“反动分子”。

sentences.en: The railway station smelt powerfully of cats and drains.
sentences.cn: 火车站上有冲鼻的猫味和臭水沟味。

sentences.en: The soldiers commandeered vehicles in the capital and occupied the television station.
sentences.cn: 士兵们征用首都的车辆，并且占领了电视台。

sentences.en: They arrested the men and frog-marched them to the local police station.
sentences.cn: 他们逮捕了这些人，并把他们押送到当地警察局。

sentences.en: You might try the gas station down the street.
sentences.cn: 你可以到街那头的加油站试试。

trans.tran_cn: 车站，局，电台，社会地位，岗位，驻军
trans.tran_en: a place where trains or buses regularly stop so that passengers can get on and off, goods can be loaded etc, or the buildings at such a place
to send someone in the military to a particular place for a period of time as part of their military duty
to send someone in the military to a particular place for a period of time as part of their military duty
